name: calculate_hyperroot_flux_parameter_expanded
description: Calculates the hyperroot flux parameter (HFP) using CuPy, incorporating detailed parameter initialization and computation across multidimensional arrays.

H.description: Base dense hyperparameters, a two-dimensional array of floating-point numbers.

R.description: Primary root hyperflux parameter, a CuPy array of floating-point numbers.

S.description: Array of multidimensional subbase sectors, a three-dimensional array of floating-point numbers.
